reviewText: This DVD is super. All the kids at Pony Camp loved it. This is a safe, enjoyable and fun way for your child to bond with their horse.

Want your pony to come running to you everytime you she/he sees you?  Help your pony feel good.  Massage before you ride.

Massage after you ride.  Massage even if you don't ride.  Mike Scott's Pony Massage For Kids DVD will teach you how to massage your pony.  Daisy and Katie will show you how it's done.  You and your pony should watch this DVD together.
